channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for SC
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for SC

item.title: Report X-2024021165
item.description:
Report X-2024021165

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-29T18:14:06+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-12
  • City: SPARTANBURG
  • State: SC
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: DRUM UNLOADED FROM CHAR TRAILER DAMAGED. HAZMAT-CERTIFIED ADMIN NOTIFIED OF DAMAGED HAZMAT. DescribePack: CRIMPED LID OPEN DUE TO DENTS IN DRUM BODY AND LID. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: HAZMAT-CERTIFIED ADMIN USING PROPER PPE REORIENTED THE DRUM INSIDE A LINED HAZMAT TOTE AND SECURED THE TOTE INSIDE THE HAZMAT CAGE.

item.title: Report X-2024020719
item.description:
Report X-2024020719

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-26T15:11:07+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-29
  • City: SPARTANBURG
  • State: SC
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: PACKAGE DROPPED WHILE LOADING. DescribePack: DENT IN BOTTLE FROM IMPACT CAUSED LID TO COME AJAR. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: HAZMAT-CERTIFIED ADMIN USING PROPER PPE PLACED THE PACKAGE INSIDE A LINED HAZMAT TOTE AND SECURED THE TOTE INSIDE THE HAZMAT CAGE.
